result.execSummary:
The defendant Sarah L Adkins was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Fine and costs to be paid within 60 days of sentencing, unless payment arrangements are approved.  Penalty for non-payment shall be entry of civil judgment.   Clerk of Courts shall docket without fees.  Send payments to:  Clerk of Courts, Room 419, 415 Jackson Street, P O Box 2808, Oshkosh WI  54903-2808.

Defendant shall provide a DNA sample by calling the Work Release Unit  at 920-232-1915 or 920-232-1919 WITHIN 72 HOURS OF SENTENCING to set up an appointment.   The Work Release Units hours are 8:00 am-4:00 pm/Monday thru Friday. Defendant shall provide proof of identification along with the court minutes stating a DNA sample is required.  Failure to comply with this order may result in either a finding of contempt of court or a criminal charge of Failure to Provide a DNA Sample pursuant to Wis. Stats. 946.52.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea
